channel.title: R on STA304 A1 DD
channel.description: Recent content in R on STA304 A1 DD

item.title: Exploring Opinions Towards Social Conflicts Using CES2000
item.description: We use R(R Core Team 2020) and R package tidyverse (Wickham et al. 2019) to do the analysis. Code and data supporting this analysis is avaliable at: “https://github.com/dding33/STA304”. Introduction Class of 2022, this is the data on the year when most of you were born! Come and check on people’s opinions towards some society issues that are still present today. The motivation is simple: in year of 2020, we consider our society to have a decent amount of modernness, in terms of humanities.
